languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, не шутите так. Это устройство, пси-удушитель, оно может помочь... наверное. Если я распахну дверку, впущу шепотки в себя насовсем, то меня... меня же не станет? Или еще что похуже."

"Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, не шутите так. Это устройство, пси-удушитель, оно может помочь... наверное. Если я распахну дверку, впущу шепотки в себя насовсем, то меня... меня же не станет? Или еще что похуже."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then I'll... I'll just be gone? Or worse."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then I'll... I'll just be gone? Or worse."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，这种事情可不能开玩笑。这个装置，这个灵能抑制器，它能抑制我的症状……我是这么想的。可如果我打开了那扇门，让那些低语声进来，那我……我会不会就这么消失了？或者说，会变得更糟？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这种事情可不能开玩笑。这个装置，这个灵能抑制器，它能抑制我的症状……我是这么想的。可如果我打开了那扇门，让那些低语声进来，那我……我会不会就这么消失了？或者说，会变得更糟？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, no puede bromear con esto. Este dispositivo, el supresor psíquico, puede ayudar... creo. Pero si abro la puerta, si dejo entrar a los susurros... ¿desapareceré? ¿O algo peor?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, no puede bromear con esto. Este dispositivo, el supresor psíquico, puede ayudar... creo. Pero si abro la puerta, si dejo entrar a los susurros... ¿desapareceré? ¿O algo peor?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, über so etwas dürft Ihr keine Witze machen. Dieses Gerät, dieser Psi-Drossler, er kann helfen ... Glaube ich. Aber wenn ich die Tür öffne, wenn ich das Flüstern wirklich in mich hineinlasse, bin ... bin ich dann einfach fort? Oder schlimmer noch?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, über so etwas dürft Ihr keine Witze machen. Dieses Gerät, dieser Psi-Drossler, er kann helfen ... Glaube ich. Aber wenn ich die Tür öffne, wenn ich das Flüstern wirklich in mich hineinlasse, bin ... bin ich dann einfach fort? Oder schlimmer noch?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、冗談はやめて。この装置、サイ・スティフラーはきっと役に立つ…と思う。でも、もし私が扉を開けて、ささやき声を私の中に本当に取り込んでしまったら、私は…消えてしまうのかしら？それとももっと悪いことが…？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、冗談はやめて。この装置、サイ・スティフラーはきっと役に立つ…と思う。でも、もし私が扉を開けて、ささやき声を私の中に本当に取り込んでしまったら、私は…消えてしまうのかしら？それとももっと悪いことが…？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Il ne faut pas plaisanter avec ce genre de chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cet appareil, ce carcan psychique peut être utile... Enfin, je le crois. Mais si j'ouvre la porte, si je laisse vraiment les murmures entrer en moi... vais-je disparaître ? Ou pire encore ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: « Il ne faut pas plaisanter avec ce genre de chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cet appareil, ce carcan psychique peut être utile... Enfin, je le crois. Mais si j'ouvre la porte, si je laisse vraiment les murmures entrer en moi... vais-je disparaître ? Ou pire encore ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bu konuda şaka yapılmaz Lord Kaptan. Bu cihaz, bu ruhboğan bana yardım edebilir... Sanırım. Fakat kapıyı açarsam ve fısıltıların içime girmesine izin verirsem... O zaman ben artık olmaz mıyım? Yoksa daha mı kötüsü olur?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, you can't joke about these things. This device, this psy-stifler, it can help... I think. But if I open the door, if I really let the whispers inside me, then will I... will I just be gone? Or worse?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuda şaka yapılmaz Lord Kaptan. Bu cihaz, bu ruhboğan bana yardım edebilir... Sanırım. Fakat kapıyı açarsam ve fısıltıların içime girmesine izin verirsem... O zaman ben artık olmaz mıyım? Yoksa daha mı kötüsü olur?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
